title: Clinical validation of an open-access SARS-COV-2 antigen detection lateral flow assay, compared to commercially available assays
authors: Bachman CM, Grant BD, Anderson CE, Alonzo LF, Garing S, Byrnes SA, Rivera R, Burkot S, Ball A, Stafford JW, Wang W, Banik D, Keller MD, Cate DM, Nichols KP, Weigl BH, Dewan P
